p: Finally, when γ in = 0 (no antigenic-drift), the solar pump cannot, alone, sustain stationary epidemic cycles but strongly modulates the course of epidemics during the first three years in the northern and southern hemisphere and over a longer period of about 8 years in the tropical area ( Figure 5A). By contrast, when the solar pump is not active ( Figure 5C), the epidemics develop identically at all latitudes and last for a single 1-year cycle ( Figure 5D).
